allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve Quick Demo Login authentication issues

- Fixed API response structure handling in login page to support nested data object
- Updated database seeder to auto-correct Super Admin email if mismatched
- Ensured seeder updates Super Admin password to AdminPass123! on mismatch
- Improved seeder logging to show existing Super Admin details on startup

Quick Demo Login now works correctly for all seeded roles.
EOF
)")
